author: Damon Dyer
description: The robust flavours of rye combine harmoniously with the other ingredients in this riff on the classic Last Word.
name: Monte Cassino
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
